values.description:
Born London, England, 1978 
Lives & works in London


Statement

Jamie Lau’s practice uses photography, video and sculpture, to explore ideas around anxiety, in the form of inertia, impermanence and disorientation. His work often involves re-contextualising landscapes and objects, through intervention or subverting their original meaning, purpose or function. He is interested in the ‘decisive moment’ within narratives, and the drama and uncertainty that belongs to that specific space and time. It’s this uncertainty, and anticipation of what is to come that is inherent within his exploration of anxiety.

In his videos Respire and Tunnel, Lau explores anxieties over drowning and falling asleep whilst driving, a theme echoed in his photographic series Car Crash Flowers which documented wilting and decomposing roadside tributes. For the series The Dark Ages he presents fast food restaurants isolated in black limbo spaces, glowing like beacons in the night. Set adrift like ships on a black sea they become pockets of recognition within an uncertain terrain. He is currently working on a new body of sculptural work that questions cultural meaning inherent within architecture.


Education

MA Fine Art Sculpture
The Slade School of Fine Art
2009 – 2012

BA (Hons) Critical Fine Art Practice
University of Brighton
(First Class)
1998 – 2001
values.name: Jamie Lau
martha and hepsie ltd
values.description:
We're sisters! Both made redundant from our ‘proper’ jobs and with degrees in design, we've put our sibling rivalry behind us (by Martha living in Sheffield and Hepsie in Devon) to create martha and hepsie ltd. Our designs are inspired by life, who we are and a little bit of laughter; and our aim is to create affordable gift and homeware that you'll love!

Martha 
After graduating with a BA (Hons) in Textile Design from Nottingham Trent, Martha moved to London to develop her career in design and production. During her time in the Big Smoke she gained an abundance of transferable skills within the design industry, working for gift and homeware designers including Lisa Stickley and Gisela Graham. At the end of 2012 she made the bold move to return to her northern roots and relocate back to the steel city of Sheffield to focus on martha and hepsie ltd and develop her freelance design career; Made by Martha. 

Hepsie 
Hepsie gained experience from work placements at Matthew Williamson, Copperwheat Blundell and trends agency The Bureaux during her ,Fashion and Business Studies degree at Brighton and progressed a marketing career with one of the UK’s leading sterling silver jewellery brands Kit Heath. Working with many key high street names and independent retailers Hepsie has honed many marketing skills including art direction, off and online brand strategy, PR and copy writing all of which are now being ploughed into martha and hepsie ltd and her marketing consultancy career.

My name is Hayley, and I'm an ofsted registered childminder based in Peacehaven, just outside of Brighton. I run my business from my brand new, spacious house. We are 5 minutes from the sea and a short walk to a well equipped park, local library and toddlers groups.

 

I offer a flexible, friendly service including term time only and part-timers welcome. My house has been inspected by ofsted and is suitable and safe for children. I am fully insured and up to date with my crb and first aid certificate. **spaces available**

 

 why choose an ofsted registered childminder? 

 

More and more parents are choosing childminders to look after their children as the service is flexible and the care is one on one. Children often settle in quickly as their home routines are respected and implemented. A warm, friendly home. environment also benefits children greatly
values.name: Little sausages childminding services

values.description:
Talent Hub is an independent company specialising in the recruitment of marketing jobs in Brighton and the South East.

We work with people experienced in all disciplines of marketing, including:
•	Digital
•	DM
•	Events
•	PR
•	Brand
•	eCommerce
•	Integrated Marketing

Agency side:
•	Client services 
•	SEO / PPC
•	Creatives
•	Strategy and Planners

We work with all levels of marketing people from Marketing and Account Executives, to Marketing Directors.
At Talent Hub we pride ourselves in taking the time to get to know our clients and their business, and also the marketers we work with who are looking for their next challenge, and that’s how we successfully match people and jobs with companies.

Understanding that culture fit, attitude and aspirations are as important as skills set and experience.
All of our team come from marketing, media and marketing recruitment backgrounds and love what we do - and like to think we know what we’re talking about.

So if you’re looking for your next opportunity, or for a talented marketer to join your team. Get in touch, lets have a chat about what we can do to help.
values.name: Talent Hub (Talent Hub Resourcing Solutions Ltd)

values.description:
Property development company.

Sites are now sought for development, either with or without planning consents.  DG is currently involved in projects with a gross development value in excess of £100 million in Southampton, Maidstone and other centres in the South East.  Our preference is for Commercial or Mixed use schemes in urban or peri-urban areas, South of the M4 corridor.  We employ a small team of principal consultants with prize-winning architects, cost consultants and project managers providing the core disciplines for our operation. We work with several well-known engineering consultancies and other advisors, as required.

Our recent projects range from a mixed use development comprising 20,000m2 of offices, subsequently let to Legal and General, and 65 apartments in Brighton and Hove, to the reworking of a residential planning consent and pre-construction work on a 10 hectare, ex-MoD site in the South West.  DG’s principal shareholder’s past projects include office and industrial development in Southern Africa and investment and development projects in the UK, France and Holland.
values.name: Dunsfold Group

values.description:
Kendrick Property Services offers free valuations, independent financial and mortgage advice as well as property sales and lettings, from its two branches in the vibrant city of Brighton and Hove. Our reputation is founded not only on excellent service but also on reliability, trust and good moral standing. 

Each of our offices has a separate designated team focussed on sales or lettings. Naturally we contact all potential home seekers though their preferred medium as soon as we have a property that will suit their requirements. Kendrick Property Services prides itself on its honest approach with clients. We have a friendly and experience team here and a good relationship with the people whom we serve. We are proud of our successes. Our aim for the future is simply to maintain and extend our good reputation. Please do contact us if you have property to sell or let, if you’re interested in buying or renting, or simply if you need some advice.
values.name: Kendrick Property Services

values.description:
Hunger is something the families all over Monroe County live with on a daily basis. The Pittsford Food Cupboard was established in 1998 to serve the needs in Pittsford, Brighton, East Rochester and two zip codes in the city of Rochester. These are: 14534, 14445, 14610, 14618, 14620, 14607

Who Qualifies:

Everyone is welcome at the Food Cupboard. Once it has been established that people have a qualifying need, they are eligible to choose groceries from the shelves twice a month. Recipients have many reasons for needing assistance:

- inadequate fixed incomes,
- single parenthood,
- a disability,
- an increase on household size,
- unexpected unemployment,
- an end to unemployment benefits,
- uninsured medical bills.

Hours of Operation:

Tuesdays: 9:30 am - 1:30 pm
Friday: 9:30 am - 1:30 pm
Every 3rd Saturday, 9:30 am - 11:30 am
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 
Want to help? Volunteer, donate, or please consider Adopting a Shelf Individually or through your Business! For more information, contact PFC: 585-264-9860 or by email at: pittsfordfoodcupboard@gmail.com

(Our United Way Donor Number is: 2387)
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

values: Feeding Hope One Family at a Time

values.name: Pittsford Food Cupboard

values.description:
Urban Inc. is a brand new Urban Music Agency based in the UK.

Operating from London, Brighton and Liverpool. We have a dedicated team of industry professionals who all share a passion for the UK  urban music scene.

We understand what the music industry has become, where it is heading and what it takes for artists to get out there and become successful in their chosen arena and that’s EXPOSURE!

Here at Urban Inc. we offer everything artist needs to achieve their goals and dreams. Whether it is a chance to hit the big stage and get their music heard across the world, to become a successful session musician or even a paid music producer, we are the company that can make it happen.

Looking at the industry we have put together a multitude of services with the music industry in mind focusing hard on the artists needs. Take a look at our services page we handle marketing, music video production, representation, distribution, and management.

Plus we have also created a brand new community. Great for all people! Not just musicians. A place to stay connected within the industry, make new contacts and find other likeminded singers, songwriters, producers to collaborate with on your next big project. Our community easily integrates with your Facebook profile for ease of use. Share video’s, pictures and music with other community users.

Urban Inc. is a total one-stop solution to any artists needs.
values.name: Urban Inc Ltd.

values.description:
SINTILLATE was founded in May 1999 by Gary Sewell and Kevin O'Shea (deceased).

We quickly built up a loyal following by providing an environment where the fashion, music and film industries can mix in a relaxed, friendly atmosphere fuelled by cutting edge music.

SINTILLATE is about 'accessible exclusivity'.

SINTILLATE were the first to provide Photos from every party onto a website for guests to see, a practice which has since become commonplace.

SINTILLATE were pioneers for the new generation of 'cyber-promoter' and www.sintillate.co.uk became a social networking site long before the advent of myspace and facebook. We believe in providing more than just a good night out. Our website aims to provide a service for the community that has built up around the Sintillate nights. 

SINTILLATE - Nightclub Promoters followed up their success in London by launching in MARBELLA in 2003, MANCHESTER in 2004, LIVERPOOL, LEEDS and SHARM EL SHEIKH in 2005, BRIGHTON and BIRMINGHAM in 2007, IBIZA and DUBAI in 2008, BRISTOL, SHEFFIELD, LEAMINGTON SPA and DERBY in 2009 and in TENERIFE and NOTTINGHAM in 2010.

In 2004 SINTILLATE won 'Best Promoter' at the London Club and Bar Awards, then again in 2008 Sintillate took the top award, this time for the 'UK's Best Promoter' at the London Club and Bar Awards.
values.name: SINTILLATE

values.description: SolarClubs is a social enterprise whose purpose is to bring more affordable solar power to local communities through group buying. We work with carefully selected local installers to negotiate great prices on domestic solar photovoltaic installations in different areas. At the minute we manage solar clubs which cover East Sussex, Brighton & Lewes, and Tunbridge Wells. Although we're based on the club/group buying concept, in fact you can register as an individual and take advantage of the same prices on solar installations without having to wait for others in your community or town to join. We also act as a free, independent portal for other solar buying groups around the country who would like to attract more members.

values: group buying; solar panels; solar installations;
solar photovoltaics; group buying; great prices!
community buying; social enterprise; renewable energy
solar pv; domestic installations; group buying

values.name: www.SolarClubs.com
